main event: Thomas J. Page reported sighting a celestial object on 14 March 1949 while en route from Honolulu to Canton Island.
interesting points: The sighting was reported as a celestial body and not man-made., The object was described as unusually large., The report was from a Pan American Airlines flight., The investigation was conducted by the Office of Special Investigations., It's suggested it could have been a meteor or possibly a comet.
sighted object: a celestial body (possibly a meteor or comet)
witness description: Thomas J. Page, a passenger on Pan American Airlines Flight 101
